title: Calendar

make_event.chained_msg: The event was scheduled. Here is the invitation link: '{url}'

intro: Please let me know if there any event you want to add to your calendar
sample: Please schedule a meeting with Tim Cook from 1pm for 30 minutes on July 4th, at his office, then, send the invitation to Tim (tim@apple.com).
prompt: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions.
Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
